text: In getServletJavaFileName()   "/" is used when java.io.File.separator should be.
creator: gregw@mortbay.org

text:
Be very careful with File.separator and '/'. 

In URI space, the separator is ALWAYS '/', regardless of the platform. A lot of 
bugs have been due to the transition between the filesystem name space and the 
URI namespace. And a lot of things are called files that are actually in the 
URI space. 

I haven't looked at this code yet, but once burned, twice shy.
creator: steve.downey@netfolio.com
gregw@mortbay.org
text:
In this case I'm passing on a report from a user.  When they tried
the latest Jetty with jasper2 on win32, if failed for them.  They
